ygData.msgSnippet: Well you see you dont construct Cybertron to the way people want. If you give them what they want then they know what to expect. It isn t fun that way. If you

Well you see you dont construct Cybertron to the way people want. If you give 
them what they want then they know what to expect. It isn't fun that way. If 
you use what we know from G1 and BW and make changes and stuff then thats 
okay becuase you still leave room for unpredicted stuff. But I agree with KSL 
in saying the RPGs demise is coming close if the Monotomoy isnt broken soon. 
You can only fight in the same place with the same people for so long before 
its not fun anymore.

--part1_8d.fb8f12d.292d6e9d_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
